H1211.def: = plant, with hollow leaves and a hollow stem about 30 centimeters tall with a spherical head of flowers; its root is a round bulb made up of tightly packed layers of fleshy, edible tissue; sharp in taste; ◄ Allium cepa; ► considered one of the tasty things from the life of Egypt that the Israelites longed for as they wandered in the Sinai Desert for forty years

H7762.def: = plant with a bulb similar to that of an onion, but smaller, and divided into four or five parts; ◄ Allium sativum; ► due to its distinctive taste and smell it is used for seasoning food, but also as medicine

H5315.def: = the part of the body connecting the head to the rest of the body and containing the passageways for blood, air, and food; ≈ associated with breathing, appetite, and life and often used metonymically to refer to the entire body and the personality inhabiting it

= substance described as falling from heaven to feed the Israelites in the desert, sometimes identified with the honeylike liquid dropping from tamarisk trees; its name is associated with the interrogative pronoun meaning "what (is it)?"

H2233.def: = a flowering plant’s unit of reproduction, capable of developing into another such plant, in some cases also used as food

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H7200.def: = process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily --though not necessarily exclusively-- with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H7657.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H5975.def: = process by which humans, deities, animals, or inanimate objects take position in a certain location in an upright position

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3381.def: = process by which objects move (involuntarily) from a place that is relatively high in elevation to a relatively lower place

H6051.def: = a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H680.def: = to remove part of an object to be used for another purpose

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7657.def: = state in which a countable entity is seven in number

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H5117.def: = action by which humans or animals stop their current or regular activities, ► often with the purpose of recovering their strength

H5012.def: = action by which humans speak or act as a prophet

H3254.def: = action by which humans or deities add to an existing number of entities

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H582.def: = human being; ◄ created by God; ≈ often associated with weakness, fragility, and mortality

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H259.def: = state in which a countable entity is one in number

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H8145.def: = state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H5117.def: = action by which humans or animals stop their current or regular activities, ► often with the purpose of recovering their strength

H3789.def: = action by which humans or deities mark letters, words or other symbols on a surface, such as clay, stone, skin, or papyrus, usually with a pointed stylus or reed

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H168.def: = construction ◄ made out of cloth or skins ► used as a temporary residence by nomads, soldiers, shepherds, and even as a sanctuary

H5012.def: = action by which humans speak or act as a prophet

H5288.def: = a young male, ranging from childhood to adulthood; ► often in the service of other people; ≈ typically regarded as healthy and physically strong, but also lacking the experience and wisdom of the {L:older men<SDBH:זָקֵן>}

H7323.def: = action by which humans walk at a relatively high speed

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H5012.def: = action by which humans speak or act as a prophet

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H3091.def: = man, also known as {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his name was Hoshea, later changed by Moses to {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>}; Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H5126.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Elishama<SDBH:אֱלִישָׁמָע>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► father of {L:Hoshea<SDBH:הֹושֵׁעַ>}, who is better known as {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H979.def: = the period between childhood and maturity; applies to males only

H6030.def: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H3607.def: = causative action by which humans hold other humans under control, either in a prison or in another situation in which that person does not have the freedom to act and go at will

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H7065.def: = process by which humans or deities experience a sentiment of anger for the sake of someone else, ◄ because that other person does not receive the attention, commitment, or treatment that they are entitled to

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H2205.def: = state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H7307.def: = an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5265.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from another object into which it had been inserted or attached in a different way

H1468.def: = causative action by which a certain force causes objects to move from one location to another

H7958.def: = small brown bird streaked with white, the smallest of the game birds; looks like a miniature {L:partridge<SDBH:קֹרֵא>}, with a small white patch beneath its beak, a white stripe above its eye, and another around its neck; the males have a black chest stripe above a chestnut-colored breast patch; ◄ Coturnix coturnix; ► clean animal and therefore fit for consumption

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3220.def: = a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water

H5203.def: = process by which ropes that used to be tightly strung begin to hang loose

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H520.def: = linear measure, corresponding to the length of the forearm, from the tip of the middle finger to the point of the elbow; the exact measure is uncertain; apparently there were two standards: the normal, estimated as 44.5 cm; and the royal, estimated as 51.81 cm

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H1870.def: = an open space connecting different places, ► used for travelling and transportation; ≈ often extended to denote our life as a journey from birth to death, and the totality of our activities during our lives

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H3915.def: = the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship

H4283.def: = the day following the present day or another day in focus

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7958.def: = small brown bird streaked with white, the smallest of the game birds; looks like a miniature {L:partridge<SDBH:קֹרֵא>}, with a small white patch beneath its beak, a white stripe above its eye, and another around its neck; the males have a black chest stripe above a chestnut-colored breast patch; ◄ Coturnix coturnix; ► clean animal and therefore fit for consumption

H4591.def: = state in which humans or objects are relatively few in number

H2563.def: = stiff tenacious earth; ► material of which bricks, pottery, and even man himself is made; ≈ buildings made with this material are regarded as relatively weak as opposed to buildings made of stone; therefore it is also seen as relatively worthless material

H7849.def: = causative action by which humans cause a substance or a set of small objects to divide itself and move into various directions

H4264.def: = open area where people are living in tents or other temporary dwellings for a limited amount of time and often for a specific purpose, such as nomads or soldiers

H1320.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H996.def: = the area separating two or mores locations

H2962.def: = a marker pointing to the time preceding a particular point in time

H3772.def: = causative action by which humans use a knife or another sharp implement to remove something from a larger object

H639.def: = the two external openings in the nose

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H2734.def: = process by which humans gradually disappear from the face of the earth ◄ as if burnt away by fire

H7227.def: = state in which an object is very large in size

H4347.def: = area of physical damage on the body; ◄ caused by an act of aggression

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H4725.def: = a specific area or point in space

H6914.def: = location ◄ in {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, between wilderness of Sinai and {L:Hazeroth<SDBH:חֲצֵרֹות>}; ► {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, and people were buried following a plague that came as a punishment from God

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H183.def: = state in which humans sense a physical craving for food or alcoholic drinks; this desire is associated with one's {L:נֶפֶשׁ<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>} ≈ and can be both good and evil

H6914.def: = location ◄ in {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, between wilderness of Sinai and {L:Hazeroth<SDBH:חֲצֵרֹות>}; ► {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped there on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, and people were buried following a plague that came as a punishment from God

H5265.def: = causative action by which humans remove an object from another object into which it had been inserted or attached in a different way

H2698.def: = location ◄ in {L:Sinai<SDBH:סִינַי>} peninsula, between {L:Kibroth-Hattaavah<SDBH:קִבְרֹות הַתַּאֲוָה>} and {L:Rithmah<SDBH:רִתְמָה>}; ► place where the {L:Israelites<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} encamped on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>} to {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, not far from the place where {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} repeated the law
